page.title: 04 Travelling People
page.content:
The site is at Fernhill next to the tip. The nearest school is St.Johns. The nearest pub is the Fernhill Hotel. Sometimes the men from the site go there. The 3 children from the site attend St.Johns.
There are 14 trailers and 7 brick sheds, 2 wooden sheds and 2 garages. The site is divided by fences and inside each plot there is usually one brick shed shared by 2 trailers. Each trailer has a garden. The site is lit by 5 lamp-posts.
Sometimes visiting trailers appear and pull up at the side of the site.
Maria Sykes age 8
